name: TriMension
description:
Avoid red enemies and collect green haloes in the three lanes of this game! Teleport around, travel from lane to lane, and make constant decisions about the best action you can make!

In this game, you must survive huge waves of enemies as long as possible, with your abilities to teleport to your opposite location, or travel between the three lanes, while collecting haloes that increase your resistance, and give you tasty points!
